statements: UPDATE dapp_statistics SET successful_requests = 100, user_engagement_score = 8.5 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE dapp_statistics SET total_requests = 500, successful_requests = 300, user_engagement_score = 9.2 WHERE dapp_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

UPDATE dapp_statistics SET successful_requests = successful_requests + 1, user_engagement_score = user_engagement_score + 0.5 WHERE dapp_id = 'b6a2ab2d-36cb-4d0d-9fc5-e552d18e7eca' AND date_created >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE dapp_statistics SET total_requests = total_requests + 10, successful_requests = successful_requests + 5 WHERE user_id = 'b032b374-886c-4ea4-a4ef-2080fad6a39b';
UPDATE dapp_usage_statistics SET usage_count=10 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE blockchain_network SET network_name='Ethereum', creation_date='2021-10-15' WHERE network_id='d7fd9a10-1262-4ed7-b9f0-96ed4cf5215c';
UPDATE dapp_usage_statistics SET usage_count = 10, engagement_level = 3 WHERE user_id = 123 AND dapp_name = 'CryptoDapp';
UPDATE blockchain_network SET network_type = 'private', network_name = 'PrivateNet' WHERE network_id = 'a8098c1a-f86e-11da-bd1a-00112444be1e';
UPDATE dapp_usage_stats SET total_sessions = 10 WHERE user_id = 123 AND dapp_name = 'App1';
UPDATE user_engagement SET engagement_value = 5.5, engagement_timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = 456 AND engagement_metric = 'clicks';
UPDATE dapp_usage_stats SET total_sessions = 10, total_transactions = 5 WHERE user_id = 123 AND dapp_name = 'MyDApp' AND usage_timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00';

UPDATE blockchain_network SET block_height = 50000, block_timestamp = '2022-01-20 10:45:00', miner_address = '0x123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz' WHERE network_id = 1 AND block_hash = '0xabcde12345fgh67890ijklmnpqrst23456';
UPDATE dapp_users SET username = 'new_username', email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE dapp_transactions SET transaction_type = 'deposit', transaction_amount = 100.50, transaction_date = now() WHERE transaction_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE dapp_users SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id='9334a532-6687-4e9e-891d-13f4de660c74';
UPDATE dapp_transactions SET transaction_amount = 150.50, transaction_date = '2022-02-28 15:30:00' WHERE transaction_id='aad8f4e6-8442-45aa-9731-8f594df15bae';
UPDATE dapp_users SET last_login = '2022-01-01' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE dapp_blocks SET block_hash = '0x123abc' WHERE block_id = 10;
UPDATE dapp_users SET username = 'john_doe', last_login = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE dapp_sessions SET end_time = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE session_id = 100;
